pr_title: SAK-43698 - Initial MVP of tool keyset URL

timeline.message:
SAK-43698 - Initial MVP of tool keyset URL

This still needs some testing (Deep Link)
and a pass through the Admin UI and to
turn off the auto creation of the public/private
tool pair when there is a keyset.  Make it so
non-keyset support can fade off into the sunset.

timeline.author: ottenhoff
